ProjectTitle: (De)constructing the 'Other'. A Qualitative Empirical Study on Views of Catholic Communities and their Members, Migrant Priests and Lay Persons, and LGBTQ+ Individuals Regarding Faith and LGBTQ+ Issues.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 07/01/2025 [REDACTED] Please note that the ICTS recommends against using OneDrive for the storage of research data. [REDACTED] your departure from KU [REDACTED] your OneDrive account will be closed, resulting in the loss of any data stored there. [REDACTED] avoid data loss, ensure that you transfer your data to an alternative storage solution before leaving. [REDACTED] can find solutions recommended by ICTS in the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] [REDACTED] share your data open if you are sure that it is fully anonymous, if there is still a (small) possibility that the participants could be reidentified please apply access restrictions so interested researchers will have to submit a request to access the files upon signing a [REDACTED] [REDACTED] [REDACTED] Please note that a persistent identifier (a DOI) will be added to your datasets when you deposit them in RDR. [REDACTED] identifier allows you to link your dataset in your publications and ensures that your dataset is findable.
